title: Big pressure on the Browns; Mack trade analytics a joke; Big Ben's rep getting hit; Belichick's vacation hustle
itunes:title: Big pressure on the Browns; Mack trade analytics a joke; Big Ben's rep getting hit; Belichick's vacation hustle
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  In this episode, Middlekauff looks at why their is ton of pressure on the Browns to win now, why John still thinks the Raiders trading Mack was a bad move despite recent praise by analytics experts, the damage being done to Big Ben's rep, why Belichick vacationing is misleading, and answer listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag.. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
